title: Hackbases or Barbarianism
description:
Chaos is brought by things not unlike hackbases!
Hackbases are similar to hackerspaces but people also live in them.https://wiki.hackerspaces.org/Hackbase <--- list of hackbases etcjoin #hackbases on Freenode !See:* https://wiki.hackerspaces.org/Hackbase* https://totalism.orgSOME INTERESTS:    Self-sustainability, off-grid, autarky / resilience and temporary architecture research & alternative construction // Free software and free hardware development // Free Industry // Open data, workflow and organisational technology, Tektology //Digital nomadism // Critical theory // Sound studio, bands, Intermedia Art // Growing food // Renewable energy technologies // Nootropics // A nomad hacker lifestyle in a network of hacklabs // "Coliving" and "Coworking" // Hacker camp // Financial and temporal freedom // Autonomy // YOUR INTEREST HERE
